title: China fund exodus hits record $40 billion in one week as investors rush to gold: EPFR
description: While China saw historic outflows, investors quietly rotated into gold funds, reinforcing the metal’s role as a safety play in volatile markets. At the same time, flows into copper-linked Latin America funds picked up, reflecting growing bets on data centre and artificial intelligence demand.
